summary: FUEL WAS LEAKING BECAUSE THE FUEL INJECTORS RUPTURED. DEALER NOTIFIED.  *AK   THE CONSUMER FILLED THE GAS TANK AND RESET THE COMPUTERIZED GAUGE TO 0 MILES PER GALLON AND 0 GALLONS USED, AND HAD DRIVEN APPROXIMATELY ONE MILE.  THE NEXT DAY AFTER DRIVING TWO MILES TO THE STORE, HE NOTICED LIQUID POURING OUT FROM THE FRONT OF THE ENGINE.   *SCC. THE FUEL RAIL ASSEMBLY LINE FAILED.  *JB
